description:
Washinomori has become famous. The residents of the village are more enthusiastic about baseball and the school successfully recruits a lot of new students. 
Kurokan encourages the rookies to get a part-time job in town, hoping that they will have more interaction with the people, and to gain their trust. Training has finally started.
The spring season game at Koshien Stadium is about to start. It`s time to see the results of all the training. 
When the team is ready to leave for the game, the news on TV is reporting major accidents. Kurokan walks calmly back and calls for Sakamoto. What happened?
Source: crunchyroll
